content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you please give me the floor plan of the apartment?

Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. I would like to see the floor plan of the apartment before agreeing to any rental terms.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Certainly, Mary Smith. I can provide you with a floor plan of the apartment. Here it is:

[Insert floor plan of the apartment here]

Please let me know if you have any questions about the floor plan or the apartment in general.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you give me the dimensions of the living room and bedroom?

Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. I would like to see the floor plan of the apartment before agreeing to any rental terms. I would also like to know the dimensions of the living room and bedroom.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Sure, Mary Smith. The living room measures 4 meters by 6 meters, and the bedroom measures 3 meters by 5 meters. Let me know if you have any other questions.
name: Heinrich Heine
